title: AMERICAN GODS Season 2 Episode 6 Breakdown & Details You Missed!
author: Think Story
comment: Orlando Jones is killing every episode this season

When it is revealed that Donar killed himself, Wednesday says, sacrifice is our most sacred act and our only form of currency. What if Donar killed himself as a sacrifice to Columbia, ensuring that America would defeat the Nazis?

Columbia was singing a famous American tune "Don't Fence Me In".

The smaller of the two dwarfs looked at Wednesday confused when he introduced Shadow as "Shadow". He pretty much asked Wednesday if he was sure about that. Wednesday had to give him a look to shush him. Shadow was too preoccupied at that moment too notice.
I agree with you, Orlando Jones has definitely been embodying his character
Orlando is amazing this season. Phenomenal acting by Ian and Pablo aswell (Mr. Wednesday and Sweeny) 👏
description:
We breakdown season 2 episode 6 of American Gods "Donar the Great" and explore its mythology and hidden details!
